content:
I think the authors did a great job of highlighting the importance of representation and inclusivity in literature. One thing that stood out to me was when Celeste Ng talked about how she intentionally incorporates diverse characters and storylines into her novels to reflect the real world we live in. 

Can you recommend some books that explore the theme of power dynamics and resistance, which we discussed in my work book club last month when we read "The Power" by Naomi Alderman?
